title: Darth Sidious

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Convert another player to a random Sith role. You only convert the roles if they are any of the following:
- Good-sided faction
- Neutral Benign
- Neutral Evils/Chaos with the witch wincon of seeing the Good-sided faction lose
- Once there are two Sith left, your defense drops to basic, and you may no longer convert.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Can perform the factional Sith kill
- Has private chat with the other Sith.
- Conversion Immune

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate those that do not submit to the Dark Side (Live to see the town lose)

desc:
Post 608
*"The Dark side of the force is a pathway to abilities some consider to be... ...unnatural."*
